item.title: Minimal example application
item.description: GITHUB PROJECT: https://github.com/Pi4J/pi4j-example-minimal In the “pi4j-example-minimal” GitHub project you can find a project which contains the minimal code to control a digital input and output with Pi4J. The project is further described on this page. The application will toggle an LED on/off and each time you press the button, the toggling speed increases. When you have pushed the button 5 times, the application stops. Wiring This minimal example application uses this wiring:
